docs.text: Duck Duck is an online data masking, redaction and sensitive data discovery platform that leverages and extends the existing capabilities of common database management systems. Supported Databases Oracle SQLServer PostgreSQL MySQL LICENCE Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International
docs.title: Duck

docs.text: Duck is an online data masking, redaction and sensitive data discovery platform that leverages and extends the existing capabilities of common database management systems.
docs.title: Duck

docs.text: Installation Make sure you have python 3.8^ Create a virtual environment with: virtualenv --python python3.8 venv Activate the virtual environment . venv/bin/activate Install duck pip install reduck Environment variables # sql alchemy path to repository SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI = postgresql://duck:duck@localhost:5432/duck # mail server host DUCK_MAIL_HOST = # mail server port DUCK_MAIL_PORT = # mail server username DUCK_MAIL_USERNAME = # mail server password DUCK_MAIL_PASSWORD = c6e2c3b36eef53 # mail from DUCK_MAIL_FROM = duck@bluecolor.io
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Make sure you have python 3.8^ Create a virtual environment with: virtualenv --python python3.8 venv Activate the virtual environment . venv/bin/activate Install duck pip install reduck
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: # sql alchemy path to repository SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI = postgresql://duck:duck@localhost:5432/duck # mail server host DUCK_MAIL_HOST = # mail server port DUCK_MAIL_PORT = # mail server username DUCK_MAIL_USERNAME = # mail server password DUCK_MAIL_PASSWORD = c6e2c3b36eef53 # mail from DUCK_MAIL_FROM = duck@bluecolor.io
docs.title: Environment variables

docs.text: Oracle Duck uses Oracle's DBMS_REDACT package to achive online data masking and redaction. The DBMS_REDACT package provides an interface to Oracle Data Redaction, which enables you to mask (redact) data that is returned from queries issued by low-privileged users or an application. Connection Make sure you have the oracle instant client. Set LD_LIBRARY_PATH to the location of the instant client. Example; export LD_LIBRARY_PATH = /path/to/instantclient_12_2
